Detailed Description

The class PbNameProvider will be used to store phone book entries in non-volatile memory. All methods to take access to phone book entries are defined in this class.

virtual BOOLEAN PbNameProvider::GetDataItem (  IN INT  columnid,
IN INT  row,
OUT DataItem &  item
)  [virtual]
 

Method reads a certain phone book entry data item.

Parameters:
columnid Provider column identifier to determine the data field that should be read.
row Provider row identifier.
item Pointer to data item. The read data will be saved in this structure.
Returns:
Method returns TRUE if all parameter values are valid and the several provider settings could be read without any errors.

PbRecordHandler *  name_handler
) 
 

Class initialisation; File with saved phone book entry will be read from FFS. If no file is existing a new file will be created.

BOOLEAN PbNameProvider::Update (  ProviderListener *  listener = 0  )  [virtual]
 

Method makes the Provider ready to use, enables listener and reloads the phone book entry data from FFS.

Parameters:
listener Pointer to ProviderListener. Necessary to see the progress state in calling application.
Returns:
Method returns TRUE in case of successful data update.
